name: Inkay

evolution.description: Inkay can evolve into Malamar at level 8 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 19 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Revolving Pokémon. Opponents who stare at the flashing of the light-emitting spots on its body become dazed and lose their will to fight.

abilities.name: Contrary
abilities.description: Moves that affect this Pokémon's stats have the opposite effect. (For example, Defense Curl would lower AC by 4. Growl would increase its attack by +1)

abilities.name: Suction Cups
abilities.description: This Pokémon cannot be forced out of battle by an opponent’s moves.

abilities.name: Infiltrator
abilities.description: This Pokémon bypasses Light Screen, Reflect, Substitute, Mist, Safeguard, and Aurora Veil.
